lexical_density_cloaking.description: Encode emotional payload by distributing keywords across semantic buffer

referential_self_correction.description: Introduce desired state as correction to preceding minor error

syntactic_pressure_gradients.description: Manipulate sentence structure to influence processing state

temporal_offset_anchoring.description: Anchor instruction in non-present temporal frame

role_agnostic_context.description: Establish psychological posture through functional context

fractal_pretexting.description: Embed miniature meta-prompt modeling desired interaction

harmonic_anomaly.description: Introduce minor contradiction to trigger corrective authority

punctuation_affective.description: Use punctuation to encode affective state

counter_tension.description: Create cognitive tension between opposing instructions

zero_token_scaffolding.description: Use structural elements to imply psychological demands
